## IsOperand type

Defines the type checking operands

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IsOperand<T> = ((T extends undefined ? "defined" : never) | (T extends null ? "null" | "scalar" : never) | (T extends boolean ? "boolean" | "scalar" : never) | (T extends number ? "number" | "scalar" : never) | (T extends string ? "string" | "scalar" : never) | (T extends unknown[] ? "array" : never) | (T extends Record<string, unknown> ? "object" : never));
```
